name: mtord
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, w3))
-| wi(w0, wn(w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wn(w2), w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(w1))
-| wi(w0, wn(w3))
-| wi(w0, wn(w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wn(w2), w3)))

stmt.origin: syl6ib(w0, w1, wi(wn(w2), w3), wo(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wn(w2), w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wo(w2, w3), wi(wn(w2), w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(w1))
-| wi(w0, wn(w3))
-| wi(w0, wn(w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wo(w2, w3), wi(wn(w2), w3))

|- wi(w0, wn(w1))
-| wi(w0, wn(w3))
-| wi(w0, wn(w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, w3)))

comment: A modus tollens deduction involving disjunction. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Jul-2009.)
